divs: Sighting Detailsonly left email cause i dont want youy to blow my phone up with excessive annoyance but saw an upsidedown pyramid metalic silver and had a flat bottom had to been govt or sumthing looking b=ecause extreemly intrested in what it was and had blinking light not tryin to say its an alien or ne thing but wish someone would shed sum light on the situation. was driving down harding road also by the airport but had clear view of the object and did not look aerodynamic at all , my wildest imagination could guess it was a cargo plaine but could not find pictures and found this to be severely unlikely. just kept its path forward not to high was not imagining things and got a good look at it. drove past it.
